Title: Yuliya Vrevskaya
Actors: Lyudmila Saveleva, Stefan Danailov, Regimantas Adomaitis
Plot: A Russian lady is taking trip back from France. In Bulgaria she meets someone and a burning love flares up between her and him. This love, which grows into a self sacrifice, makes Yuliya Vrevskaya follow the troops as a nurse in t...
